Text: RE Altra Confidentiality Agreement Cc Attached is a redline with a few changes to the letter These should all be consistent with the substance you have Let me know if you or Mark wish to discuss Regards Tim Sturm Assistant General Counsel Altra Energy Technologies Inc Lamar Suite Houston Texas Fax Email Original Message From Tana Jones mailto Sent Friday May PM To Cc Louise Kitchen Mark Taylor Subject Altra Confidentiality Agreement At the request of Louise Kitchen I am attaching our proposed form of Confidentiality Agreement It is our desire to have this agreement executed before the Tuesday May meeting with Louise and Mark Crosno If you have any comments or questions please call me at or Mark Taylor VP and Assistant General Counsel at Sincerely Tana L Jones Sr Legal Specialist See attached file Altradoc Confid Letter Agreementdoc
